mapper.sql: id, user_id, computer_ids, title, status, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into report
id,
user_id,
computer_ids,
title,
status,
create_time,
`describe`,
content,
summary,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{computerIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update report
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
computer_ids = #{computerIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
`describe` = #{describe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
summary = #{summary,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update report set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, computer_ids = #{computerIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `describe` = #{describe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
